column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////For the pizza: we ordered a 9 inch butter crust Lou Malnati pizza which comes with this amazing sausage
column2: cheese and tomato sauce on top of this very light and crispy BUTTER crust. For a deep dish
column3: it did not feel too heavy on the stomache (unless you ate way too much of it). After a couple beers
column5: we were too full for the chocolate chip in a pan dessert but I WISH I had gotten it!
